page.title: 10Petworth Police
page.content: The Police Station is south of the New Library in Rosemary Close. In the Petworth Police Force they have got 1 Chief Inspector,2 Sergeants,8 constables,1 Traffic Warden,1 Cleaner,1 gardener,2 Counter Clerks,1 Driver Ordily,3 Detectives,1 School Liasion Officer,3 Secretaries and 2 Dog Handlers. In 1984 they had 225 prisoners. There are 2 cells at Petworth Police Station. They haven,t got any alarms in the Station. They have got 1 computer and 1 print out machine. There are 6 police vehicles. The capacity of the engines in the Caveliers is 1,600cc. They haven,t had any police killed at Petworth. They have shifted some lunatics before. They work 8 hours a day.
